posts.title: week 1
posts.content: On our first we we were oriented by our instructor. We were given a detailed introduction to the work we would be doing in the coming weeks on the length of our internship

posts.title: week 2
posts.content: on this week we were introduced to the technologies that the office utilizes in their day to day development. We were also given a brief introduction to the projects we would be working on in the coming weeks

posts.title: week 3
posts.content: This week, we kicked off the semester with our first project: the Bicol University Clientele Management System (BUCSM). This system is designed to streamline the university's compliance with the Anti-Red Tape Act (ARTA) by allowing staff to monitor service ratings across different university offices.
